Reviews.Content: Old rooms, weak service. Not worth the price. Have been in this hotel many times and so can give a trustable opinion about it : rooms are big, but old, end '70 style, and not well maintained. Bathroom is usually not big and kind of old style as well : not very clean and with a bad working shower. All rooms I have stayed in would have needed a total refurbishment. It is very clear that the hotel was built in the late 70 era.The restaurant downstairs is very badly carried on : tables are not always clean. Last time I waited 20 minutes before someone could actually see they have a new guest who wanted to order. Waiters are messy and breakfast offered in the morning is very, very poor and the overall service lacks.At the end not a 4 stars hotel at all.
Reviews.Author: IlTex74

Reviews.Content: Enjoyed Being There Had to cut my trip short to an emergency but I had a thoroughly enjoyable stay at this hotel. The room, the restaurant, and the hotel services were excellent. Very congenial staff and of course, comfortably air-conditioned.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Lage und Ausstattung hervorragend(z.B Pool)   showReview(11444621, 'full');
